author: Special Correspondent
text:
Union Environment Minister Prakash Javadekar, who is in-charge of Tamil Nadu Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) for the upcoming elections, slammed the DMK-Congress alliance and said the parties were “two zeroes” who would not add up to become heroes.

Speaking to reporters on the sidelines of an event here, Mr. Javadekar said the NDA in the State would be finalised in a week.

GAIL project

On the GAIL project that political parties have opposed, he said the Centre would take a comprehensive view on it.
title: Congress, DMK two zeroes: Javadekar
